short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The internal Yotpo support tool. Extracts appkey, product ID, and Star Ratings.  Also for testing Rich Snippets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features include:
* Finding and displaying the store Appkey
* eCommerce platform(beta) 
* Product ID on the current page
* Checking the installation of star ratings
* Testing Rich Snippet implementation
* Integration with JS BIN
